idea: Team RoboNut organize or conduct events,internship and workshop for students all over the India based on hardware or software.
name: RoboNut

idea: Sciative Solutions applies proprietary artificial intelligence techniques at scale to enable its clients find Right Prices for every product, every market, every customer, Every Transaction. Built on the core team’s subject matter expertise in price optimization science and enterprise technologies, our solutions are consistently delivering high-revenue generating performance for clients spread across multiple industries such as media, retail, ecommerce, hospitality, travel, entertainment, CPG, electronics, and others. We have many firsts to our credit, such as first surge (dynamic) pricing tool for TV ad slots, movie tickets, bus seat tickets, with many more in making. Recently, we also got recognized as #LevelNxt Startup – top 10 most promising and innovative start-up – by PwC, FICCI and CNBC.
name: SCIATIVE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Democratising finance by providing access to affordable credit to underbanked and unbanked Bharat.
name: Fundfina Marketplace

idea: Balloony.in  is an online website operating under the company named as PURALA Tech Consulting Services Private Limited headquartered in Mumbai, India. Its develops, market and operates the balloony balloon decoration and entertainment service website

idea: We set up self check out mini supermarket in corporate offices. We stock up packaged foods,beverages, perishables like dahi/yogurt, Brownies,Fruits, meals, etc.
name: Searo Pvt Ltd

idea:
India is the largest consumer and exporter of chillies in the world. Indian cuisine is globally renowned for all things spicy. And still, the best-selling hot sauce in India is an American product made with chillies from Mexico.

At Naagin, we felt it’s about time someone stepped in to represent the best of Indian flavours and spice culture. We are fuelled by a raw passion for food exploration to bring you a truly lip-smacking and unabashedly Indian hot sauce!

If you are passionate about what you do, you never settle for half measures in what you do. We put the same fiery passion into our sauces as you do in the pursuit of what you love. All in the name of a quality meal.
name: MIKSAR FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
FinX (AV Financial Experts Network Pvt. Ltd.) is working towards creating Financial Ntrepreneurs for the BFSI Industry. It is a unique and collaborative approach to create a sustainable stream of skilled and employable resources (intrapreneurs) and new financial entrepreneurs for BFSI sector.


FinX intends to cater to the needs of productive and skilled resources for BFSI sector by collaborating with the industry leaders in multiple domains to provide a First In India skilling platform that trains the candidates on Savings (Banking), Protection (Life Insurance, General Insurance & Health Insurance), Investing (Mutual Funds, Equities, Debt), Financing (Retail credit) and allied fields to become a skilled financial services professional / entrepreneur. The programs combine the technical strength of the eminent industry leaders with the industry expertise to provide a unique comprehensive learning experience.
name: AV FINANCIAL EXPERTS NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED
